description:
spec: fix constant expression example

Fixes issue 4400.

messages.text:
Hello r (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

LGTM with added example

http://codereview.appspot.com/6782084/diff/1/doc/go_spec.html
File doc/go_spec.html (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6782084/diff/1/doc/go_spec.html#newcode3659
doc/go_spec.html:3659: const Θ float64 = 3/2      // Θ == 1.0   (type float64, 3/2 is integer division)
add this too:
const Π float64 = 3/2.      // Π == 1.5   (type float64, 3/2. is float division)

On 2012/11/17 00:57:58, aam wrote:
> Fixes issue 4400

oops, missed it in the description, my bad.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=f5b22a4df675 ***

spec: fix constant expression example

Fixes issue 4400.

R=r, mirtchovski
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6782084

subject: code review 6782084: spec: fix constant expression example
